artist: Engraver: Jacob Houbraken; Painter: After Jan Maurits Quinkhard
description: half length portrait facing viewer; wearing neckerchief; in an ornate oval
inscription:
Title, and Inscription

below image in black: [BALTHAZAR HEYDECOPER/ Texelae Praetor aggerumque ibidem Praefectus etc/ six llines of Latin verse Huydecoperum simulac pinxisset .../...inter Vondelissque locat./ by Jac. Phil. D\'Orville]; on sheet in pencil: [1-564]; on verso at bottom of sheet in pencil: [60   133-22   60]
title: Portrait of Balthazar Huydecoper
